actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the management of environmental matters at the Paducah Gaseous Diffusion Plant, Kentucky, through the Assistant Secretary of Energy for Environmental Management.

summary.text: Instructs the Secretary of Energy to provide for the management of environmental matters pertaining to the Paducah Gaseous Diffusion Plant.( Kentucky), through the Assistant Secretary of Energy for Environmental Management.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the management of environmental matters at the Paducah Gaseous Diffusion Plant, Kentucky, through the Assistant Secretary of Energy for Environmental Management.
